content:
this pattern is for a crochet cover for a pinback button   it uses a few yards of scrap acrylic yarn

additional materials
  • 1 1/4 inch pinback button
  • craft glue optional
  • plastic eyes
  • thread or embroidery floss
i have free directions http //www girlontherocks com/knit/blog/2007/04/24/make-your-own-eyes-part-ii/ for the eyes used in the example if you need them
